markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Tengu](/Traits.aspx?ID=240)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 270 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the tengu ancestry. Tengus are [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) who resemble birds. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tengus. An item with this trait is created and used by tengus.
name: Tengu
